entry.title: Campus recruitment in wuhan
entry.content:
There was 2days that i came to wuhan. Yestoday, we went to HuaZhong University of Science and Technology to prepare our Career Talk. Many Students deliver their resumes, It makes me recall my graduate period 5 yeas before. I was wishing a good chance. So many dreams in the front of mine. It was the time that i struggle for my self. Memories come out like stream, How am I now?

Today, I will review the applicant and then decide which one we should choose, guys, come on!
